title: WBSEDCL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 447 Junior Engineer Posts
description: The West Bengal State Electricity Distribution Company Limited (WBSECL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 447 Assistant Manager, Junior Engineer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Post-graduation, Diploma in Electrical Engineering, PGDM, and MBA can apply for the WBSEDCL Notification 2025. The interested applicants can ap...
